thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Dinah C.
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Dinah C.

author: Dinah C.
title: Dinah C.
text: I'm quite satisfied with my experience with Goway in our 4-country travel planning to Asia. Agent was knowledgeable and his response was fast. Programs at each country was great and met our expectation, from hotel to tours and guides. The one missing star is due to the suboptimal logistics sequence from country to country - instead of Bangkok-Vietnam-Taiwan-HK, we went through Bangkok-Taiwan-Vietnam-HK. Had I paid a bit more attention prior to finalizing plan, I would have requested changes.
